info.title: Collect API
info.description: API Reference for the BaseOne Collecion Service API - v1 - 23 04 23

post.description: Make a charge via your preferred collection channel. This endpoint collects the funds from your customer or payer.
Authorize the transaction from the Charge endpoint by supplying the OTP sent to the customer or payer who's making the payment.

parameters.name: transactionReference
parameters.description: Unique ID of the payment transaction

get.description: This endpoint returns the status of a transaction made via the Collect API

parameters.name: transactionReference
parameters.description: Unique ID of the payment transaction

Channel.description: Collection channel through which the funds will be collected

responseMessage.description: Response message from charge back debit service

currency.description: Currency of funds to be received

country.description: Country from which payment is to be received

channel.description: Collection channel, it could be Transfer, Cards, or other channels

clientReference.description: Add your optional ID to identify the transaction

tokenizeType.description: determines if a customer wants the card tokenized with PIN authorization or not

chargeParameter.description: Pass in the charge parameter key-value pairs for the transaction if any. It could be the card details such as cardNumber, cardPin, cardCvv, cardExpiredYear, and cardExpiredMonth

transactionMeta.description: Information about payment like product name etc

currency.description: Currency of funds to be received

country.description: Country from which payment is to be received

Api-Key.description: Api key needed to access the endpoints. Api-Key: My_API_Key
Api-Key.name: Api-Key

Public-Key.description: Api key needed to access the endpoints. Public-Key: My_Public_Key
Public-Key.name: Public-Key
